summary: Batch files for all basic armor and weapons. More to be added later.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to get a full set of armour with one console command? Tired of looking up the ID of every single piece of armour in a set, and then having to trawl through tons of pre-enchanted stuff?

Well, lucky I\'m here, right? I put together some easy-to-use batch files to save you time and... well, not money, but it\'ll definitely save you time. Just download the package you want and drop the .txt files within into your Skyrim folder ([i]NOT your Data folder![/i]). Once in-game, type \'[i]bat filenamehere[/i]\', replacing \'filenamehere\' with the name of the batch file you want to run.

Here\'s an overview of each package of batch files:

[b]Light Armor Batch Files[/b] contains:
[list]
[*]Separate files for each standard light armor set, minus shields
[*]One file to add all standard light armor sets, minus shields
[/list]

[b]Heavy Armor Batch Files[/b] contains:
[list]
[*]Separate files for each standard heavy armor set, minus shields
[*]One file to add all standard heavy armor sets, minus shields
[/list]

[b]Weapon Batch Files[/b] contains:
[list]
[*]Separate files for each set of standard weapon materials, plus shields
[*]One file to add all standard weapons of each material, plus shields
[/list]

[i]WARNING: Only use weaponDRAGONBONE, dawnguardDAWN, or weaponALL if Dawnguard.esm is placed immediately after Skyrim.esm and Update.esm in your load order. If it is not, open the files in question and change the \'02\' prefix to whatever position in your load order Dawnguard occupies. The files will not work properly otherwise.

The same idea also applies to the Dawnguard Batch Files optional download.[/i]

[b]Future Plans:[/b]
[list]
[*]Faction batch file (Imperial Legion, Stormcloak Rebels, Companions, Dark Brotherhood, [s]Dawnguard, and possibly Volkihar Vampires[/s])
[*]Ancient Nord armor and weapons
[*]Clothing
[*]Mage robes (including Thalmor gear)
[*]Support for Dragonborn upon its PC release
[*]Optional packages for popular armor/weapon mods
[/list]

[b]Got a suggestion? drop it in the comment section and I\'ll see what I can do.[/b]
author: Sparrows
